shoes.name: Air Max
shoes.description: Old-skool look, new-school comfort! The Nike Air Max SC trainer defines style with its heritage silhouette, easy going lines and unbeatable Air cushioning. White and black colourway and Swoosh branding completes.

shoes.name: All Star Hi
shoes.description: The Converse All Star Hi is a true style icon. The hi-top silhouette is dressed in a black canvas upper, bearing the original Chuck Taylor badge on the inner ankle. A white vulcanised sole with classic toe cap completes. As cool now as it ever was.

shoes.name: Jadon 8 Eye Boots
shoes.description: Arriving with a 4.5cm platform sole and plenty of attitude, this modern classic from Dr. Martens is exactly what you need to take on the new season. The black leather upper and iconic stitched branding finishes the chunky Jadon 8-Eye boot perfectly.

shoes.name: Old Skool
shoes.description: They say true style never goes out of fashion; and the Vans Old Skool is a staple trainer for any collection. The skate profile arrives in black fabric, with suede overlay for added durability. White Sidestripe branding and a waffle tread completes.
